page.title: 17Leafield Customs.
page.content: 1.May Day. In our school, to choose the May Queen and Jack of the Green, we make a ballot box and vote.Then we make our garlands and have a procession round the green.Every year we get last year's queen to crown this year's May Queen.On May Day we do maypole dancing and the mums and dads come in rain, sun or any weather.We do it for fun and if we didn't it wouldn't go on any more. 2.Our Bonfire. The village bonfire is started in October for November 5th . Everyone piles chairs,wood,rags and tyres on the green .The big boys light it at 6.30 pm.
